content:
# Center of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence

URL: https://cdsi.agh.edu.pl/en
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:39:20

We are proud to announce that our PhD student, Mateusz Wojtulewicz (under the supervision of Prof. Leszek Rutkowski), has received funding from the NCN Preludium grant and will implement a research project titled 
Solving Data-Centric AI Challenges Using Advanced Sampling Techniques
.
